name: Square Adventure 2
description:
A game with a red square and lots of shapes. And swords  and bombs and every other medieval weapon. A game of adventure strategy and betrayal.  You travel around the map to face all kinds of mutant shapes and enter the 8 kingdoms. and then soon figure out...You are actually the mutant monster destroying the 8 kingdoms.

The Game is in development. Controls are WASD and ERF for abilities. (four swords, hide enemies and heal).  Each has a cool down of 30,40,40.
